headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Get 40% off all Arcade locations, upgrades, and modifications.

Plus, there's 35% off the LCC Sanctus and discounts on a variety of other vehicles designed to strike terror into the hearts of mortals across the spectrum:

- Western Nightmare Deathbike â€“ 50% off
- MTL Nightmare Cerberus - 50% off
- HVY Nightmare Scarab - 50% off

And more! Visit the Rockstar Newswire for more details!
